title: Narendra Modi - Wikipedia
snippet: Following a terrorist attack in Indian-administered Jammu and Kashmir, Modi presided over the 2025 India–Pakistan conflict, which resulted in a ceasefire. Under Modi's tenure, India has experienced democratic backsliding and has shifted towards an authoritarian style of government, with a cult of personality centred around him. As prime minister, he has received consistently high approval ratings within India.

title: Know the PM | Prime Minister of India
snippet: The unprecedented third term underscores Shri Modi’s enduring appeal and the trust placed in him by millions of Indians to lead the nation towards greater prosperity and stability.
